details:
• Bordered by dense forest for privacy and natural habitat
  • Small stream running through the property
  • Mature oak trees present
  • Rolling hills with picturesque views
  • Property situated on a rise with panoramic views of distant mountains
  • Clearing in the center of the land offers a spacious, open area
  • Wildflowers and native plants found throughout the property
  • Mild winters and warm summers in the region
  • Hiking and biking trails in nearby forests
  • Southern exposure ensures plenty of sunlight throughout the day

summary.landDetails: Stream, Hills, Trees, Wildflowers, Native Plants

title: Oak Grove Acres
description: Oak Grove Acres is a beautiful piece of land located in the charming town of Newberry, South Carolina. This property spans 10 acres and is surrounded by lush forests, providing a peaceful and secluded retreat. The land is mostly flat and open, making it suitable for a variety of uses such as building a dream home, starting a small farm, or even developing a nature reserve. With easy access to local amenities and the beauty of the surrounding area, Oak Grove Acres is an opportunity not to be missed.
